alert.note: Alert for Callahan; Shackelford; Throckmorton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 21 at 7:11PM CST by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Callahan, Shackelford and eastern Throckmorton Counties through 800 PM CST... At 710 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Mccarty Lake, or 7 miles southwest of Albany, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Albany, Throckmorton, Moran, Woodson, Ibex, Elbert, Fort Griffin, Mccarty Lake, Lusk, Us-283 Near The Callahan- Shackelford County Line, The Intersection Of Us- 283 And Ranch Road 209, Us-180 Near The Shackelford- Stephens County Line and The Intersection Of Us-183 And Us-283. This includes Interstate 20 between Mile Markers 313 and 314. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
